mapper.select: select y.* from tb_user u inner join tb_user_intention b on u.user_id = b.user_id inner join tb_intention y on b.intention_id = y.intention_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_intention (intention_status, intention_position, intention_business, intention_city, intention_personally) values ( #{intentionStatus}, #{intentionPosition}, #{intentionBusiness}, #{intentionCity}, #{intentionPersonally})
mapper.update: update tb_intention set intention_status=#{intentionStatus}, intention_position=#{intentionPosition}, intention_business=#{intentionBusiness}, #{intentionCity}, #{intentionPersonally} where intention_id = #{intentionId}
